channel.title: Time Series on Ryan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on Ryan's Blog

item.title: Time Series
item.description: The third way we can visualize data is with Time Series: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) query<-"select yearID, HR from Batting where playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homeruns Through the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("Homeruns") The xlab and ylab are labels that are optional and editable.
